# `useSignOut()`

Use the hook `useSignOut` to sign out the user.

```tsx
import { useSignOut, useAuthenticated } from '@nhost/react'

const Component = () => {
  const { signOut } = useSignOut()
  const isAuthenticated = useAuthenticated()

  if (isAuthenticated) {
    return <button onClick={() => signOut()}>Sign Out</button>
  }

  return <div>Not authenticated</div>
}
```

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">stateAll</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>boolean</code>

---
